title: Post to win!
text: Now your Avenir15 App can get you a  chance to win cool Gift Vouchers.All you have to do is just share the Snapshot of the app and this bit.ly/Avenir15App link on your timeline with #Avenir15. And 1 lucky winner every day will be announced on the app via push notification. So stay tuned with your app :) And best of luck

title: Winner of 5th April. Post 2 Win
text: Post 2 Win, winner for today is Hemant Kumar . Congrats Hemant . And keep up this good thing . And for the rest, you still have a chance . Open the App, take a screenshot and share it with "bit.ly/Avenir15App" and #Avenir15 ** Its open for all ** Best of Luck .

title: Winner Of 6th and 7th April Post2Win
text: Winner Of 6th and 7th April Post2Win Contest are Mrinal Chandra and Rishi Raj. Congrats Rishi And Mrinal. You guys have won eBay's gift voucher.  Keep up this good thing. Other, Keep posting your app's Screenshot with bit.ly/avenir15app and #Avenir15. Next Number can be yours.

title: About Avenir:
text: One heck of an event. I'm so looking forward to those three days. Guys, brace yourselves for an exhilarating experience!!

finally!! the day has come.
I welcome each one of you to join us , so that we could make it an event it was never before!
title: AVENIR
